title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 6.13 - Petty cash account
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 6.13 - Petty cash account

State Regulations

The head of a department or agency may request that a petty
cash account be established for his or her department or agency in accordance
with section
115
of the

State Finance Law. The monies in the account shall be used in accordance with
accounting policies and procedures established by the

Comptroller. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
6.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
